---
title: "Life Expectancy Report"
format: html
execute: 
  echo: false
  warning: false
  message: false
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```

```{r}
life_expectancy <-
  gapminder |>
  select(country, year, lifeExp) |> 
  filter(country == "Afghanistan")
```

## Life Expectancy in Afghanistan

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = life_expectancy,
  aes(
    x = year,
    y = lifeExp
  )
) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal()
```
